name: lofersil-landing-page
description: LOFERSIL Landing Page - Static TypeScript site for Vercel deployment

scripts.build: npm run build:compile && npm run build:css && npm run build:copy
scripts.build:copy: npm run build:copy:dirs && npm run build:copy:assets && npm run build:copy:scripts && npm run build:copy:cleanup
scripts.build:copy:dirs: mkdir -p dist/scripts/modules && mkdir -p dist/locales && mkdir -p dist/assets/images && mkdir -p dist/en
scripts.build:copy:assets: cp index.html privacy.html terms.html robots.txt sitemap.xml site.webmanifest browserconfig.xml favicon.ico dist/ && cp -r assets/images/* dist/assets/images/ && cp src/locales/*.json dist/locales/ && cp en/*.html dist/en/
scripts.build:copy:scripts: cp node_modules/dompurify/dist/purify.min.js dist/scripts/ && cp dist/modules/*.js dist/scripts/modules/ && cp dist/types.js dist/validation.js dist/index.js dist/scripts/
scripts.ci: npm run lint && npm run format:check && npm run build:compile && npm run test

author: LOFERSIL
